description:
A baby whose mother is a customer of http://anidb.net/ch14624 [Osono]`s bakery.
The mother left the baby`s pacifier behind in the shop; http://anidb.net/ch11210 [Kiki] volunteers to bring the item to this woman, making the first practical use of her ability of broom-flying in her new home town, and making her first new friend in the process.
name: Akanbou
